snippet: “The Wedding (The Walker Evans Polaroid Project)” and a Michael St. John show are paired at the Andrea Rosen Gallery.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews exhibition The Wedding (The Walker Evans Polaroid Project) and works by Michael St John at Andrea Rosen Gallery.
lead_paragraph: “The Wedding (The Walker Evans Polaroid Project)” and a Michael St. John show are paired at the Andrea Rosen Gallery.

headline.seo: MICHAEL ST. JOHN: ‘In the Studio Twenty Eleven’ and ‘The Wedding (The Walker Evans Polaroid Project)'
